_sText:
This prefab shows how it is possible to make it impossible for the player to save in the levels of a map.

## **What does this prefab?**
With this method players can no longer save inside a level and teleport back to that position if they fail. They will have to start the level again.

## **Why did you invented this?**
I wanted to make climb a little bit more skillbased.

## **Can I use this for some parts of my map only?**
Of course! You deside where the player can teleport to and where not. You can enable this feature at just one level at your map or everywhere.

## **How does this work?**
Download the file and take a look in the readme.

## **Is there a map with that prefab, so I can test it?**
Yes there is. I created the map kz\_chase\_nocp to demonstrate that prefab. Feel free to check it out here: [http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/178798](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/178798 "http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/178798")

If you want to create a map using this prefab, credit me and I suggest you to add "\_nocp" at the end of the mapname to make it visible to the player.


Dotty
